com.markussecundus.forms.extensibility

Class IExtensible

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.extensibility.IExtensible
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extensible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAbstractDrawableElem, BasicRectangle, BasicRenderer.ShapeToBasicDrw, BinaryGraphicalComposite, InputManager, RoundedRectangle, TextureDrawable

    public class IExtensible
extends java.lang.Object
implements Extensible
    Canonical implementation of Extensible, that provides extensions map as a lazily created instance of HashMap (to minimize overhead in case no extension is ever used).
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    Extensible, BasicAbstractDrawableElem
